title: Tom and Jerry
description: It is 1941 and British Special Operations Executive (SOE) agent Tomasina `Tom` Meadows is one of the first few operatives dropped into the small town of Dinan in German Occupied France, assigned to make contact and organise French Resistance groups. Unfortunately she is soon betrayed and captured by the dreaded German secret police, the Gestapo. She and the other captives are subjected to terrible and obscene tortures, but her captivity soon takes a strange turn and she is faced with revelations about her own sexuality, danger from all sides, and the possibility of love and rescue from the most unexpected quarter. In a tale filled with sex, torture, romance and thrills, follow Tom Meadows's adventures as she struggles to survive captivity and to escape back to England.Available only from:http://www.tabooreading.com/ebooks/b1...and http://www.a1adultebooks.com/ebooks/b...
author: V.W. Singer
